name: UIScene.OpenExternalURLOptions
desc: Options you specify when asking a scene to open a URL.

items.name: var universalLinksOnly: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that indicates whether URLs must be universal links and have a configured app to open them.

items.name: var eventAttribution: UIEventAttribution?
items.desc: An object you use to send tap event attribution data to the browser for Private Click Measurement.
